acceptance-test-run.title: Memoization should work correctly for collections and arrays
acceptance-test-run.name: memoizationShouldWorkCorrectlyForCollectionsAndArrays

test-step.description: When I invoke the factory manufacturing for <span class='step-parameter'>class uk.co.jemos.podam.test.dto.MemoizationPojo
Then the Object should not be null
Then the given array should not be null or empty and contain elements of type 6OjHRLwIXq
Then the collection should have exactly 6OjHRLwIXq elements
Then the collection should not be null or empty and each element should be of type F5D9LfDZRN
Then the two objects 5 and 5 should be equal
Then the Map should not be null or empty and each element should have key of type lBZrC4_CSh=uV35sRP9gD and value of type 8h9VBSYLeM=OJqRu5lsiS
Then the two objects 5 and 5 should be equal
